definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

sentences.english: The chancellor, Alistair Darling, admitted yesterday that the recession was deeper than the government had expected.
sentences.chinese: 財相戴理德昨天承認經濟衰退比政府預料的要嚴峻。

sentences.english: In February, Nakagawa resigned as finance minister in disgrace after appearing drunk at a news conference.
sentences.chinese: 中川昭一2月因在新聞會上露醉態而辭去財相職務。
